DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate lens centration subjective impression DAILIES® AquaComfort Plus® ( DACP ) lenses compare 1-DAY ACUVUE® MOIST® ( 1DAM ) lenses ball sport player .
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Evaluation Contact Lens Centering DAILIES® AquaComfort Plus® Versus 1-DAY ACUVUE® MOIST® Japan
DOC.criteria: Those understand clinical study objective provide write informed consent . Legal representative parental consent require age 20 Those regularly wear soft contact lenses eye minimum 8 hour per day 5 day per week Those play ball sport least 1 day per week Those need vision correction myopia mild myopic astigmatism , eligible use study device , attain visual acuity least 1.0 correction Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply Those regularly wear study device Those require ocular treatment eye drop Those condition contraindicate soft contact lens wear , eye irritation Those ocular disorder ocular surgery may affect soft contact lens wear within 3 month start study Those participate another clinical study research plan participation present study Women pregnant intend become pregnant study Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply
